Description: Pottery ostracon: on one side only, three vertical lines of a model letter similar to the 'Book of Kemit', followed by five consecutive numbers.
Curator's comments: Model letter of EA 21186, 21216, 21284 published by F. Hagen, ''Ostraca Literature and Teaching at Deir el-Medina' in R. Mairs and A. Stevenson (ed.), Current Research in Egyptplogy 2005 (Oxford 2007), pp. 38-51.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389482) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389482)
